title: american horror story freakshow - killer clown 4x3 scene

comment: If I was that guy and saw the trail of blood I would just be like, fuck this shit I'm out

Wtf why does he so closely inspect it? I'd leave and get police as soon as I saw that robot in the first place, but if I was stupid enough to follow it, I'd peek around the corner and see the head, this isn't a clue game.
why the hell would you follow the trail of blood
He wouod be tge perfect Dead by Daylight Killer
